markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Vanara Disciple](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1359)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Vanara culture prizes order and discipline, leading to many vanaras studying monastic practices. They also value compassion, kindness, and community, whether that community is their own or one they're visiting. Most vanaras are quick to offer aid to those in distress and rarely hesitate in the face of evil, no matter the danger it presents. The leaders of vanara villages tend to be religious figures, or occasionally others possessing similar values and experience. Vanaras venerate [Ragdya](/Deities.aspx?ID=194), the Sage of the Mountain, who encourages seeking enlightenment through worldly action and sees the virtues of pranks and humor.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 17

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Vanara.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Vanara Disciple](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1359)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 286</row>

**Perception** +6; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10), [Vanara](/Languages.aspx?ID=72)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Prehensile Tail** The vanara can use their long, flexible tail to perform Interact actions requiring a free hand, even if both hands are otherwise occupied. Their tail can't perform actions that require fingers or significant manual dexterity, including any action that would require a check to accomplish, and they can't use it to hold items.

**Items**
[Bo Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [javelins](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 16

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bo staff +4 ([Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d8+1 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +7 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 13
- **1st**
[Pest Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=217) (monkey only)

**Flurry of Blows** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The vanara disciple makes two [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

**Spring Up** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Requirements** The vanara disciple is [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31); **Effect** The vanara Stands, then can immediately Step twice. The Stand action doesn't trigger reactions.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-274" />
name: Vanara Disciple
